channel.title: [508] Npc attack code

item.title: [508] Npc attack code
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

i need to add a npc hit, so i added a switch to switch npc ids;
switch(npcID){
case 130:
n.appendHit(1,0);
break;
}
NPC n = new NPC();
and in NPC.java i added public NPC(){}
Any ideas how to fix that/add this in another way?

Read full topic
